metadata.name: The Dream of The Child
metadata.description:
I took this photo in Mardin. I saw a boy running towards me through the door. At that moment, I saw that the cross on the back and the child were one. I wish the dreams of children to come true. It is a photo of me that I present to all the children of the world.
It is possible to find the cross, which is the symbol of Christianity, which takes on three different cross in this photograph, where the belief is visible.

Camera: Fujifilm XT-3
Lens: Fujinon 10-24mm
Dimensions: 6425 Ã— 4283
Resolution: 300dpi
Location: Mardin, Turkey
Date: 25/09/2021
Awards: He received awards from many international competitions.
Edition: 1/1
